game.name: Battlestar Mazay
game.description:
Today we are going to take you on a unique type of adventure that you will not forget forever. Are you ready to try it out right away? Join Battlestar Mazay and prove the world that you are brave enough to play any role in this barbaric world! It will be highly exciting and amazing to become the part of the adventures of Mazay who had given their best to play the role of caption of the star cruiser. Grab your gun and be prepared to complete all the missions in this two-dimensional arcade shooter! 
This platform is full of pirates who know nothing but attacking the ships and grabbing their most of cash and other useful items. Your objective in this cool html5 war game is to destroy all the enemies lashed with the dangerous weapons. At the beginning of the game, you see one of the pirates providing supporting to the other twos to escape from jail. Then they start attacking the city and destroying the happiness of all. You as a pirate captain have to activate the weapons on your ship to eliminate all your enemies. 
Try to complete this task before they take you out and send you to the prison! Your successful efforts will reward you with some money through which you can upgrade your weaponry and make yourself stronger than before. We are damn sure that you are having your greatest times after playing this fun adventure game. Check out more entertaining and thrill-filled games for kids where you do not need to download app or software to play online!
